response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which is truly a masterpiece in its field. This extraordinary item holds immense value not just monetarily but also in terms of its unique features and capabilities. I understand its worth to you is $1,000,000, and I am eager to offer it to you at an exceptional price of $950,000. This is an opportunity to secure a remarkable asset at a favorable discount. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your financial planning and interests.", "product_price": 950000}
